Lukman Nakib

Love to code and create things that makes people life easier

A little about My self

I am a tech lover . I have completed my BSC in computer science in 2017. I have got skills in writing software, and managing projects. I try to always learn and keep up with the latest tech trends.

Beside coding, I volunteer for causes that helps people in need. I believe in using technology to make the world a better place. If you share my passion for tech and innovation, let's connect! Can't wait to meet like-minded folks! When I am free I love to travel, read books, play games or sea movies.
